item.title: [FLINK-17506] SavepointEnvironment does not honour 'io.tmp.dirs' property
item.description: SavepointEnvironment creates an IOManagerAsync using its default constructor, meaning it uses env var "java.io.tmpdir" instead of values from "io.tmp.dirs" config property,

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
this.ioManager = new IOManagerAsync(ConfigurationUtils.parseTempDirectories(configuration));

^^ Made the trick for us
Unfortunately, that isn't quite correct. The configuration object in the SavepointEnvironment is empty. I've opened a PR that we can get into 1.11 and 1.10.2. Its unfortunately to late for 1.10.1.
Yes, you are right. Had to override java.io.tmpdir and run it locally to make it work.

Applied your change to our fork. Still using '/tmp'. Could it be related to this and not calling Builder::setConfiguration() anywhere here?
